CustomField.formula: HomeTeam__r.DisplayName__c & " Vs " & AwayTeam__r.DisplayName__c & " (" & CASE ( MONTH( DATEVALUE( MatchStartTime__c )), 1, "January", 2, "February", 3, "March", 4, "April", 5, "May", 6, "June", 7, "July", 8, "August", 9, "September", 10, "October", 11, "November", 12, "December", "None" ) & " " & TEXT ( DAY ( DATEVALUE( MatchStartTime__c ))) & ", " & TEXT ( YEAR ( DATEVALUE( MatchStartTime__c ))) & ")"
CustomField.label: Match Title
